description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The SVC_LN_INFO_2 table holds information about the service lines on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: LN_TOS
columns.description: This item holds the type of service for the procedure on the service line.

columns.name: LN_DATE_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a qualifier to distinguish between a single date (when the from and to dates are the same) and a date range (when the from and to dates are different).

columns.name: LN_PURCH_SERV_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the purchased service charge amount for the line.

columns.name: LN_REFERRING_CLIA
columns.description: This item holds the Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) number of the referring lab for the line.

columns.name: LN_HOSPICE_EMP_IND
columns.description: This item holds the Hospice Employee Indicator.

columns.name: LN_HOSPICE_COND_IND
columns.description: This item holds the Hospice Condition Indicator.

columns.name: LN_TTL_AMT_PAID
columns.description: This item holds the total amount paid for the line by all payers. This item is populated for both paper and electronic Professional Billing Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) claims but is only used when printing paper claims.

columns.name: LN_ADJR_ITM_REF_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the Adjusted Repriced Line Item Reference Number.

columns.name: LN_SERV_TAX_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the line's Service Tax Amount.

columns.name: LN_FAC_TAX_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the line's Facility Tax Amount.

columns.name: LN_REP_ITM_REF_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the Repriced Line Item Reference Number.

columns.name: LN_PRC_METHOD
columns.description: This item stores the Line Pricing Methodology.

columns.name: LN_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the Line Allowed Amount.

columns.name: LN_SAVINGS_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the Line Savings Amount.

columns.name: LN_REP_ORG_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Line Repricing Organization Identification Number.

columns.name: LN_PRICING_RATE
columns.description: This item stores the Line Pricing Rate.

columns.name: LN_APPRVED_DRG_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the Line's Approved diagnosis related group (DRG) Code.

columns.name: LN_APP_DRG_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the Line Approved diagnosis related group (DRG) Code.

columns.name: LN_APP_REV_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the Line Approved Revenue Code.

columns.name: LN_REPAPR_HCPCS_QL
columns.description: This item stores the Line Repriced Approved Healthcare common Procedure Coding System (HCPS).

columns.name: LN_REPAPP_HCPCS
columns.description: This item stores the Line Repriced Approved (Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) Code.

columns.name: LN_UNIT_MSRMNT_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the Line Unit or Basis for Measurement Code.

columns.name: LN_APR_SVC_UNT
columns.description: This item stores the Line Approved Service Units or Inpatient Days.

columns.name: LN_OPR_SER_ETQ
columns.description: This item stores the Entity Type Qualifier for line's Operating Physician ID.

columns.name: LN_OPR_LAST_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the line's Operating Physician's Last Name.

columns.name: LN_OPR_FIRST_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the line's Operating Physician's First Name.

columns.name: LN_OPR_MID_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the line's Operating Physician's Middle Name.

columns.name: LN_OPR_NAME_SUFFIX
columns.description: This item stores the line's Operating Physician's Name Suffix.

columns.name: LN_OPR_NPI
columns.description: This item stores the line's Operating Physician's ID.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_ETQ
columns.description: This item stores the qualifier for line's Other Operating Physician.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_LAST_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Other Operating Physician's Last Name.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_FIRST_NM
columns.description: This items stores the line's Other Operating Physician's First Name.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_MID_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Other Operating Physician's Middle Name.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_SUF_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Other Operating Physician's Name Suffix.

columns.name: LN_OTH_OPR_NPI
columns.description: This item stores the line's Other Operating Physician ID.

columns.name: LN_REF_ETQ
columns.description: This item stores the line's Referring Provider's Entity Type Qualifier.

columns.name: LN_REF_LAST_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Referring Provider's Last Name.

columns.name: LN_REF_FIRST_NM
columns.description: This item stores line's Referring Provider's First Name.

columns.name: LN_REF_MID_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Referring Provider's Middle Name.

columns.name: LN_REF_SUFFIX_NM
columns.description: This item stores the line's Referring Provider's Name Suffix.

columns.name: LN_REF_NPI
columns.description: This item stores the line's Referring Provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_DME_PROC_CD
columns.description: Stores Line durable medical equipment (DME) Procedure Code

columns.name: LN_DME_QTY
columns.description: Stores Line durable medical equipment (DME) Length of Medical Necessity

columns.name: LN_DME_RENTAL_PRICE
columns.description: Stores Line durable medical equipment (DME) Rental Unit Price Indicator

columns.name: LN_DME_PUR_PRICE
columns.description: Stores Line durable medical equipment (DME) Purchase Price

columns.name: LN_DME_RUP_IND
columns.description: Stores Line DME Rental Unit Price Indicator

columns.name: LN_AMB_PAT_WT
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Patient Weight

columns.name: LN_AMB_TRANS_RSN_CD
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Transport Reason Code

columns.name: LN_AMB_TRANS_DIST
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Transport Distance

columns.name: LN_AMB_RND_TRIP_DES
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Round Trip Purpose Description

columns.name: LN_AMB_STRETCH_DESC
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Stretcher Purpose Description

columns.name: LN_RX_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Prescription Date

columns.name: LN_LST_CERT_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Last Certification Date

columns.name: LN_LST_SEEN_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Last Seen Date

columns.name: LN_SHIPPED_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Shipped Date

columns.name: LN_LST_XRAY_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Last X-Ray Date

columns.name: LN_INIT_TREAT_DT
columns.description: Stores Line Initial Treatment Date

columns.name: LN_OBS_ADDL_UNTS
columns.description: Stores Line Obstetric Additional Units

columns.name: LN_IMMNZTN_BAT_NUM
columns.description: Stores Line Immunization Batch Number

columns.name: LN_SALES_TAX_AMT
columns.description: Stores Line Sales Tax Amount

columns.name: LN_POST_CLM_AMT
columns.description: Stores Line Postage Claimed Amount

columns.name: LN_ORD_CNCT_NAM
columns.description: Stores Line Ordering Provider Contact Name

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_ADDR_1
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location Street Address Line 1

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_ADDR_2
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location Street Address Line 2

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_CITY
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location City

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_STATE
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location State

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_ZIP
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location Zip Code

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_CNTRY
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location Country Code

columns.name: LN_PICK_UP_CNTRY_S
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Pick-Up Location Country Subdivision Code

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_NAME
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Name

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_ADDR_1
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Address Line 1

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_ADDR_2
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Street Address Line 2

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_CITY
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location City

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_STATE
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location State

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_ZIP
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Zip

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_CNTRY
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Country Code

columns.name: LN_DROP_OFF_CNTRY_S
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Drop-Off Location Country Subdivision Code

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_IDEN
columns.description: Stores line service facility location's entity identifier

columns.name: LN_RECERT_DT
columns.description: Store line recertification date

columns.name: LN_QTY_TXT
columns.description: This item holds the units of quantity string for a service line.

columns.name: LN_NOTE_TPO
columns.description: This item holds a line level third party organization note.

columns.name: LN_PURCH_SERV_REF
columns.description: This item holds the purchased service reference identifier for the line.

columns.name: LN_DME_LAST_CERT_DT
columns.description: The last certification date for a durable medical equipment (DME) to be printed on the claim.

columns.name: LN_REF_ENTITY_IDENTIFIER_CODE
columns.description: This item stores the line's referring provider's entity identifier code.

columns.name: LN_FILL_NUMBER
columns.description: The code indicating whether the prescription is an original or a refill.

columns.name: LN_DAYS_SUPPLY
columns.description: Estimated number if days the prescription will last.

columns.name: LN_DAW_CODE
columns.description: Code indicating whether or not the prescriber's instructions regarding generic substitution were followed.

columns.name: LN_NDC_COST
columns.description: This item holds the unit cost associated with the National Drug Code (NDC) for the service line, which is expected to be the charge amount divided by the NDC quantity.

columns.name: LN_MCR_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount that Medicare paid for the service line for field.

columns.name: LN_OTHR_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the amount that the commercial coverage, if any, paid for this service line.
